derivation: or כִּיֹּר; from the same as H3564 (כּוּר);
outline:
1. pot, basin, laver, pan
    1. pot, caldron
    2. fire-pot, brazier
    3. basin, laver
    4. platform, stage
strongs_def: properly, something round (as excavated or bored), i.e. a chafing-dish forcoals or a caldron forcooking; hence (from similarity of form) a washbowl; also (for the same reason) a pulpit or platform
